sentences.en: American manufacturing organizations have been downsizing their factories.
sentences.cn: 美国制造商们一直在缩小他们工厂的规模。

sentences.en: And as businesses decentralize and downsize, information systems follow suit.
sentences.cn: 并且随着企业的分散化和小规模化, 信息系统也产生同样的变化.

sentences.en: Automotive executives are being asked to downsize their salaries as are financial workers.
sentences.cn: 高层管理人员的薪资被降到了和财务人员同等水平.

sentences.en: He will downsize the executive board of the three divisions.
sentences.cn: 他将缩小三家公司的执行董事会.

sentences.en: I lost my job because the boss says we need to downsize.
sentences.cn: 因为老板说要缩减成本,所以我丢了工作.

sentences.en: It is also planning to downsize its loss - making chip and home appliance divisions.
sentences.cn: 此外,三洋电机还在裁减其亏损中的芯片及家用电器生产部门.

sentences.en: It is said that the company is going to downsize staff, everyone is feeling anxious.
sentences.cn: 据说公司要裁员了, 大家全都人心惶惶.

sentences.en: Our new orientation reflects the fact that we've been forced to downsize.
sentences.cn: 我们的新取向反映了我们被迫缩编的事实.

sentences.en: Sales have decreased so much that they need to downsize.
sentences.cn: 销售业绩减少很多,所以他们必须缩小规模.

sentences.en: Seems the only way out is to cut some programs and downsize our organization.
sentences.cn: 看来唯一的出路是减少一些慈善项目和精简我们的机构. ”

sentences.en: The airline has downsized its workforce by 30%.
The company chose to downsize and more fully utilize the remaining workers.
sentences.cn: 公司决定缩小规模,并更加充分地用好余下的工人.

trans.tran_cn: 以较小尺寸设计；缩小尺寸；裁减人数
trans.tran_en: if a company or organization downsizes, it reduces the number of people it employs in order to reduce costs

trans.tran_cn: 以较小尺寸设计（或制造），缩小（汽车等的）外部尺寸
trans.tran_en: To downsize something such as a business or industry means to make it smaller
